text.name: info9
text.text: The Atari 800 family is a series of 8-bit home computers

text.name: info10
text.text: based on the MOS Technology 6502 CPU running at 1.79 MHz, and

text.name: info11
text.text: were the first home computers designed with custom co-processor chips.
